list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add product detail page and enhance search functionality
Introduced a dynamic Product Detail page with routing and API integration using `axios`. Improved search functionality with debounced filtering, infinite scroll, and enhanced UI/UX, including product images and pricing. Updated API endpoints to use `localhost` and adjusted dependencies to support the changes.

task.summary:
Add initial React app setup using Create React App
This commit includes the boilerplate code for a React application created with Create React App. It adds default scripts, dependencies, configurations, and the project structure (including `.gitignore`, `.idea` settings, and basic components). The setup is ready for development and further customization.

Add product search feature with route setup and API integration
Implemented a new Products page with SKU-based search functionality using `axios` for API calls. Integrated `react-router-dom` for routing and added `react-helmet` for dynamic page titles. Updated dependencies and organized project structure by adding services, routes, and configuration files.

Remove entire React front-end application setup.
This commit removes all files related to the React front-end, including source code, configurations, dependencies, and build assets. The deleted files encompass project setup files, React components, styles, routing, and package manager configurations such as `package.json` and `package-lock.json`. This indicates a complete decommissioning or transition away from this front-end stack.

Remove React front-end application and assets.
This commit eliminates all React-related code and files, including components, configurations, routing, and static assets such as logos and styles. It signifies a full discontinuation of the React-based front-end, likely for migration or restructuring purposes.

Add product detail page and enhance search functionality.
This commit introduces a new dynamic Product Detail page with routing, powered by `axios` for API integration. Enhancements to the search functionality include debounced filtering, infinite scroll for results, and improved UI/UX with product images and pricing. Additionally, dependencies have been updated to support these features.

Add product detail page and enhance search functionality
Introduced a dynamic Product Detail page with routing and API integration using `axios`. Improved search functionality with debounced filtering, infinite scroll, and enhanced UI/UX, including product images and pricing. Updated API endpoints to use `localhost` and adjusted dependencies to support the changes.
